CN: 将「症状：谵妄」与「症状：盲从」洗入抽牌堆。
EN: Shuffle one of each of the Symptoms "Hallucinations" and "Blind Obedience" into the Draw Pile.

CN: 造成 <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> 点伤害 [AttackTimes:Arg2] 次。将「症状：谵妄」与「症状：盲从」洗入抽牌堆。
EN: Deal <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> DMG [AttackTimes:Arg2] times. Shuffle the Symptoms "Hallucinations" and "Blind Obedience" into the Draw Pile.

CN: 造成 <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> 点伤害 [AttackTimes:Arg2] 次。降低所有唤醒体 [Arg3] 点狂气，施加 [Arg4] 层<BleedingIconKeywords:出血>，将「症状：谵妄」与「症状：盲从」洗入抽牌堆。
EN: Deal <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> DMG [AttackTimes:Arg2] times. Reduce all Awakeners' Aliemus by [Arg3], inflict [Arg4] stacks of <BleedingIconKeywords:Bleed>, and shuffle the Symptoms "Hallucinations" and "Blind Obedience" into the Draw Pile.

CN: 造成 <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> 点伤害 [AttackTimes:Arg2] 次，施加 [Arg3] 层<BleedingIconKeywords:出血>，塞入2张「症状：谵妄」。
EN: Deal <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> DMG [AttackTimes:Arg2] times, inflict [Arg3] stacks of <BleedingIconKeywords:Bleed>, and add 2 "Hallucinations" Symptom cards.

CN: 造成 <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> 点伤害 [AttackTimes:Arg2] 次，降低所有唤醒体 [Arg3] 点狂气，塞入 2 张「症状：谵妄」。
EN: Deal <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> DMG [AttackTimes:Arg2] times, reduce all Awakeners' [Arg3] Aliemus, and insert 2 "Hallucinations" Symptom cards.
